sentences.en: A creeper was entwined ( a ) round [ about ] the pillar.
sentences.cn: 一根 攀缘 植物缠绕在柱子上.

sentences.en: Eight massive stone pillars supported the roof.
sentences.cn: 八根巨大的石柱支撑起房顶。

sentences.en: He dropped the letter into the pillar - box.
He was a pillar of the club for over thirty years.
sentences.cn: 30多年来他一直是这个俱乐部的顶梁柱.

sentences.en: He was the pillar of the church.
I fell asleep against a pillar.
sentences.cn: 我靠在一根柱子上睡着了.

sentences.en: Mr Fitzwilliam had been seen as a pillar of the community.
sentences.cn: 菲茨威廉先生已被视为社区的骨干。

sentences.en: She has been a pillar of the church all her life.
sentences.cn: 她一生都是教会的中坚.

sentences.en: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar.
sentences.cn: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

sentences.en: Some people enjoy that kind of life, drifting from pillar to post.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢这种生活, 到处漂泊游荡.

sentences.en: The good Abbot of Holywood is a strong pillar to the weak.
sentences.cn: “圣林”修道院的主持是弱者的万无一失的靠山.

sentences.en: The pillar is a little tilted.
Then three were tied to the pillar for execution.
sentences.cn: 接着有三个人被捆在刑柱上准备行刑.

sentences.en: There is a pillar box at the street corner.
This monumental pillar was built in memory of a great navy victory.
sentences.cn: 这根纪念柱是为纪念一场海战的大胜而建的.

sentences.en: Tied on a pillar as that dog on the photograph.
sentences.cn: 照片上照着那只狗被拴在一根柱子上.

sentences.en: We dodged behind a pillar out of sight of the tourists.
sentences.cn: 我们躲到柱子后面，避开了观光者的视线。

words.tran_cn: 用柱支持；用柱子的形式体现（pillar的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 到处：从一处到另一处；来来往往

trans.tran_cn: 柱，台柱，顶梁柱，墩，柱脚，（组织、制度、信仰等的）核心
trans.tran_en: a very important part of a system of beliefs or ideas
